::Grounded::
Grounded notices to in chivtron signals from a little away from the base.
Then all of a sudden rockets were heading his way.
He hit the alarm to notify the rest.
The shields took the explosion of the rockets and auto guns came up.
A combination of twenty were fired towards the group.
"We need some ppl outside he called to the rest. And get that Lynxiz
to help..." he screamed out...


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Wooo!
>
